Title: Butterfly
Plot: When Tommy asks for extra vacation time, Chief Reilly tips him off on how to get a free two week vacation from headquarters. While building a deck for Tommy's neighbor, Tommy takes advantage of his "free" advice which leads him to make a bold move in reconciling with Janet.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Bruce Altman,  Gerry Bamman,  Jill Latiano,  Robert Clohessy,  Bryan Batt,  Kevin Rennard,  Teresa Yenque
